critique: The document is an executive order regarding appointments within the Bureau of the Census. The primary goal seems to be administrative efficiency and adherence to existing civil service rules. There's no strong emotional appeal intended. The order aims to maintain consistency and fairness in part-time employment within the Federal Government. Therefore, the emotions elicited are likely to be minimal.
